message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.EC, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the design of truthful mechanisms, which is a topic in game theory (cs.GT) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The focus on constructing a verification algorithm suggests a connection to algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The application of the approach to facility location suggests a connection to economics and computation (cs.EC). Finally, the measurement of the quality of mechanisms suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG).
